action.action-desc: Mr. Bacon introduced the following bill
Referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To authorize the Secretary of Defense to enter into a limited number of cost-plus incentive-fee contracts for the Sentinel Intercontinental Ballistic Missile program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Sentinel Program Construction Risk Mitigation Act of 2023.

section.header: Form of contracting authorized to mitigate risk to Sentinel program schedule and cost
section.text: Notwithstanding section 3323 of title 10, United States Code, the Secretary of Defense, for a military construction project associated with the Sentinel Intercontinental Ballistic Missile program launch facilities, control centers, and related infrastructure, may use a cost-plus incentive-fee form of contracting for not more than the first two low-rate initial production lots for such a project.
